snippet: Letting the Rockets acquire Jeremy Lin may not have been the popular choice among New York fans, but the Knicks may have made the right move by not re-signing him.
abstract: Letting the Rockets acquire Jeremy Lin may not have been the popular choice among New York fans, but the Knicks may have made the right move by not re-signing him.

headline.main: Rhoden: Letting Lin Walk Might Not Be So Bad
